price: 91. Tonnaah caagiida dilqharneynik koh elle maaqqa hayne inna, kaadu usuk nummah reedaa kee qandek leh yaniimit Ni-ixxiga maroh tan.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
